New Champion!” Tiffany raised Lita’s arm into the air and Lita yanked the title belt off of Victoria’s waist.

“It’s not very fun when you’re the one getting jumped, is it?” Lita taunted Victoria.

Lita went over to Candice and yanked her purple pants down which exposed her skimpy pink panties but also caused Trish’s key card to drop to the floor. Lita picked up Trish’s key and hefted the Women’s Championship onto her shoulder as she walked back out of the circle.

Trish stared at Lita in shock. She had won the championship in the time it had taken her to put on the t-shirt and pants that Lita had brought her. Lita tossed Trish her room key and waved the championship in her face.

“Looky what I’ve got,” Lita remarked. “Now if you ever want this back, you’re gonna have to beat me to get it.”

A fire lit in Trish’s eyes as she stared at her rival while she held the Women’s Championship that still had ‘Trish Status’ on the nameplate.

“Oh, I’ll get it alright!” Trish assured her. “I’ve still got my rematch so you’d better be ready!”

“Bring it then,” Lita retorted as she walked off with Trish’s championship.

Trish was now ready to write this ordeal off as a horrible day if it meant facing her rival in an epic clash to reclaim her gold.


GOOD-ISH END

info.brief_description: Five of our favorite (or not so favorite) WWE Divas end up naked and embarrassed.
info.description:
This interactive story is about five former or current WWE Divas and how they get naked and embarrassed.

Kelly Kelly (an exhibitionist who is trying to learn how to prove herself as a capable wrestler and keep her clothes on at the same time)

Christy Hemme (just recently joined the Diva roster after winning the WWE Raw Diva Search and is prone to being pranked by the other Divas)

Eve Torres (the assistant to Smackdown General Manager and the current Divas Champion who desperately needs an aptitude adjustment)

Melina Perez (who has a string of bad luck in keeping her clothes on)

Trish Stratus (probably the greatest Diva in WWE history and is also prone to being pranked by the other Divas)

Rules:
No mentions of drugs (legal/illegal), violence, derogatory names or any combination thereof. I hate stories like that. I want this story to be funny and lighthearted. Also do not involve any of the male wrestlers. You can use any of the Divas both past and present except for Vickie Guerrero (who I don't count as a Diva anyway, but I want to make it clear).
